Title: XSS Vulnerability
Description: CKEditor, a third-party JavaScript library included in Drupal core, is affected by a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability. It's possible to execute XSS inside CKEditor when using the `image2` plugin.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 8.4.7, all versions starting from 8.5.0-alpha0 before 8.5.2
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 8.4.7 before 8.5.0-alpha0, all versions starting from 8.5.2
